verses.verse: And it came to pass, when all the people <WH1471> were clean <WH8552> passed over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383>, that the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>,
Take <WH3947> you twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH582> out of the people <WH5971>, out of every <WH259> tribe <WH7626> a man <WH376>,

And command <WH6680> ye them, saying <WH559>, Take <WH5375> you hence out of the midst <WH8432> of Jordan <WH3383>, out of the place where the priests' <WH3548> feet <WH7272> stood <WH4673> firm <WH3559>, twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68>, and ye shall carry them over <WH5674> with you, and leave <WH3240> them in the lodging place <WH4411>, where ye shall lodge <WH3885> this night <WH3915>.

Then Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> men <WH376>, whom he had prepared <WH3559> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, out of every <WH259> tribe <WH7626> a man <WH376>:

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto them, Pass over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> into the midst <WH8432> of Jordan <WH3383>, and take ye up <WH7311> every <WH259> man <WH376> of you a stone <WH68> upon his shoulder <WH7926>, according unto the number <WH4557> of the tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>:

That this may be a sign <WH226> among <WH7130> you, that when your children <WH1121> ask <WH7592> their fathers in time to come <WH4279>, saying <WH559>, What mean ye by these stones <WH68>? in time: Heb. to morrow

Then ye shall answer <WH559> them, That the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> were cut off <WH3772> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068>; when it passed over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383>, the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> were cut off <WH3772>: and these stones <WH68> shall be for a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so as Joshua <WH3091> commanded <WH6680>, and took up <WH5375> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68> out of the midst <WH8432> of Jordan <WH3383>, as the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Joshua <WH3091>, according to the number <WH4557> of the tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and carried them over <WH5674> with them unto the place where they lodged <WH4411>, and laid them down <WH3240> there.

And Joshua <WH3091> set up <WH6965> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68> in the midst <WH8432> of Jordan <WH3383>, in the place where the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> which bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> stood <WH4673>: and they are there unto this day <WH3117>.

For the priests <WH3548> which bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> stood <WH5975> in the midst <WH8432> of Jordan <WH3383>, until every thing <WH1697> was finished <WH8552> that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091> to speak <WH1696> unto the people <WH5971>, according to all that Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091>: and the people <WH5971> hasted <WH4116> and passed over <WH5674>.

And it came to pass, when all the people <WH5971> were clean <WH8552> passed over <WH5674>, that the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> passed over <WH5674>, and the priests <WH3548>, in the presence <WH6440> of the people <WH5971>.

And the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>, and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, and half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>, passed over <WH5674> armed <WH2571> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, as Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696> unto them:

About forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> prepared <WH2502> for war <WH6635> passed over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> unto battle <WH4421>, to the plains <WH6160> of Jericho <WH3405>. prepared: or, ready armed

On that day <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> magnified <WH1431> Joshua <WH3091> in the sight <WH5869> of all Israel <WH3478>; and they feared <WH3372> him, as they feared <WH3372> Moses <WH4872>, all the days <WH3117> of his life <WH2416>.
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>,
Command <WH6680> the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>, that they come up <WH5927> out of Jordan <WH3383>.
Joshua <WH3091> therefore commanded <WH6680> the priests <WH3548>, saying <WH559>, Come ye up <WH5927> out of Jordan <WH3383>.

And it came to pass, when the priests <WH3548> that bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> were come up <WH5927> out of the midst <WH8432> of Jordan <WH3383>, and the soles <WH3709> of the priests' <WH3548> feet <WH7272> were lifted up <WH5423> unto the dry land <WH2724>, that the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> returned <WH7725> unto their place <WH4725>, and flowed <WH3212> over all his banks <WH1415>, as <WH8543> they did before <WH8032>. lifted: Heb. plucked up flowed: Heb. went

And the people <WH5971> came up <WH5927> out of Jordan <WH3383> on the tenth <WH6218> day of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, and encamped <WH2583> in Gilgal <WH1537>, in the east <WH4217> border <WH7097> of Jericho <WH3405>.
And those twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> stones <WH68>, which they took out <WH3947> of Jordan <WH3383>, did Joshua <WH3091> pitch <WH6965> in Gilgal <WH1537>.

And he spake <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, When your children <WH1121> shall ask <WH7592> their fathers <WH1> in time to come <WH4279>, saying <WH559>, What mean these stones <WH68>? in time: Heb. to morrow
Then ye shall let your children <WH1121> know <WH3045>, saying <WH559>, Israel <WH3478> came over <WH5674> this Jordan <WH3383> on dry land <WH3004>.

For the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> dried up <WH3001> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> from before <WH6440> you, until ye were passed over <WH5674>, as the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> did <WH6213> to the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, which he dried up <WH3001> from before <WH6440> us, until we were gone over <WH5674>:

That all the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> might know <WH3045> the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068>, that it is mighty <WH2389>: that ye might fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> for ever <WH3117>. for ever: Heb. all days
